energy.usef.core.service.business

Class CorePlanboardBusinessService

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.service.business.CorePlanboardBusinessService

  • public class CorePlanboardBusinessService
extends Object
    Global BusinessService class to help with methods used in multiple roles.

      • storePrognosis

        public List<PtuPrognosis> storePrognosis(String usefIdentifier,
                                         Prognosis prognosisMessage,
                                         DocumentType prognosisType,
                                         DocumentStatus initialStatus,
                                         String participantDomain,
                                         Message message,
                                         boolean isSubstitute)
        Stores a new Prognosis in the planboard.
        Parameters:
        usefIdentifier - The usefIdentifier of the ConnectionGroup.
        prognosisMessage - The Prognosis message which has to be stored in the planboard.
        prognosisType - DocumentType prognosis type
        initialStatus - The initial status of the document.
        participantDomain - The participant domain as a String.
        message - saved message
        isSubstitute - whether or not we are creating a Missing Prognosis.
        Returns:
        The list of stored PtuPrognosis.

        prognosisType - DocumentType prognosis type
        initialStatus - The initial status of the document.
        participantDomain - The participant domain as a String.

        isSubstitute - whether or not we are creating a Missing Prognosis.

      • findPlanboardMessagesOlderThan

        public List<PlanboardMessage> findPlanboardMessagesOlderThan(org.joda.time.LocalDateTime localDateTime,
                                                             DocumentType documentType,
                                                             DocumentStatus documentStatus)
        This method finds PlanboardMessage based on DocumentType and DocumentStatus.
        Parameters:
        localDateTime - The LocalDateTime the message should be before.
        documentType - The type of document, like request, offer or order.
        documentStatus - The status of document, like new, submitted or rejected.
        Returns:
        The list of PlanboardMessage which have a specific DocumentType and DocumentStatus.

      • findOrCreatePtuContainersForPeriod

        public List<PtuContainer> findOrCreatePtuContainersForPeriod(org.joda.time.LocalDate period)
        Find or create the PTU containers for a given period. If some ptu containers already exist in the database, nothing new will be created (even though such a situation should not happen).
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate period.
        Returns:
        a List of PtuContainer.

      • processMoveToValidateEvent

        public boolean processMoveToValidateEvent(org.joda.time.LocalDate period)
        This will update the phase of all the PtuContainer entities with the given period. The new PtuContainer.phase will be 'Validate'.
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate date of change.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • processBackToPlanEvent

        public void processBackToPlanEvent(org.joda.time.LocalDate period)
        This will update the phase of all the PtuContainer entities with the given period. The new PtuContainer.phase will be 'Plan'.
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate date of change.

      • processDayAheadClosureEvent

        public void processDayAheadClosureEvent(org.joda.time.LocalDate period)
        This will update the phase of all the PtuContainer entities with the given period. The new phase will be PtuContainerState.DayAheadClosedValidate.
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate date of change.

      • processIntraDayClosureEvent

        public void processIntraDayClosureEvent(org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                        Integer ptuIndex)
        This will update the phase of all the PtuContainer entities with the given period and ptu index. The new phase will be PtuContainerState.IntraDayClosedValidate.
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate date of change.
        ptuIndex - Integer index of the PTU.

      • processMoveToOperateEvent

        public void processMoveToOperateEvent(org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                      Integer ptuIndex)
        This will update the phase of all the PtuContainer entities with the given period and given ptu index. The new phase will be PtuContainerState.Operate for the specified PtuContainer. The previous PtuContainer will be set to PtuContainerState.PendingSettlement.
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate date of change.
        ptuIndex - Integer index of the PTU.

      • findConnectionsWithConnectionGroups

        public Map<ConnectionGroup,List<Connection>> findConnectionsWithConnectionGroups(List<String> connectionGroupIdentifiers,
                                                                                 org.joda.time.LocalDate period)
        Finds the list of connection entities for each given connection group usef identifier at the given period.
        Parameters:
        connectionGroupIdentifiers - List of String which are the USEF identifiers of the ConnectionGroups.
        period - LocalDate period of validity of the relationship between the connection and the connection group.
        Returns:
        a Map with ConnectionGroup as key and a List of Connection as value.
